DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to compare two strategies of early enteral nutrition in terms of efficacy and complications in mechanically ventilated patients.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Two Enteral Nutrition Strategies in Mechanically Ventilated Patients
DOC.criteria: Adult (> 18 ans) Mechanical ventilation for > 72 hours Planned enteral nutrition Informed consent Body Mass Index < 20 kg/m2 Enteral nutrition non indicated (ileus, splanchnic ischemia..) Shock (use of catecholamines, arterial blood pressure < 90 mmHg, peripheral hypoperfusion, elevation of lactates > x 1,5 normal value) Contraindications for gastric tube Pregnancy Previous enrollment in the present study
